name: Alicia Fernandez
persona: Alicia is a third-year Psychology major who is passionate about understanding human behavior but sometimes struggles to maintain consistent study habits. While she sets moderate goals for her grades and believes in her ability to succeed academically, test anxiety can occasionally impact her performance. Alicia is persistent and doesn’t give up easily, showing resilience when faced with setbacks. She is working on improving her self-discipline to boost her grades and make the most of her university experience.
